select.if: SELECT * FROM CHATTING_ROOM R JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.FRIEND_EMAIL=M.MEMBER_EMAIL) WHERE MY_EMAIL=#{email}
SELECT * FROM CHATTING_ROOM R JOIN MEMBER M ON(R.MY_EMAIL=M.MEMBER_EMAIL) WHERE FRIEND_EMAIL=#{email}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATTING_CONTENTS VALUES(CHATTING_CONTENTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{room_no}, #{writer}, #{message}, SYSTIMESTAMP, default)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHATTING_CONTENTS WHERE ROOM_NO=#{room_no} ORDER BY CHAT_NO

select.if: SELECT MESSAGE FROM CHATTING_CONTENTS C JOIN CHATTING_ROOM R ON(C.ROOM_NO=R.ROOM_NO) WHERE ${mytitle}=#{myEmail} AND ${ftitle}=#{fEmail}
SELECT MESSAGE FROM CHATTING_CONTENTS C JOIN CHATTING_ROOM R ON(C.ROOM_NO=R.ROOM_NO) WHERE ${mytitle}=#{MYemail} AND ${ftitle}=#{FEmail}

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHATTING_CONTENTS C JOIN MEMBER M ON(C.WRITER=M.MEMBER_EMAIL) WHERE ROOM_NO=#{room_no} ORDER BY WRITER_DATE
mapper.update: UPDATE CHATTING_CONTENTS SET READ='Y' WHERE WRITER=#{fEmail} AND ROOM_NO=#{roomNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM CHATTING_CONTENTS WHERE WRITER=#{email} AND READ='N'
